xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/791112-A Guide to Gunfighters of the Wild West 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3f2ZgHArxnBF5sJYiA4t5cldZaF.jpg Part of the 12 Western feature films to be made in 12 months during 2020: the film tells the story of Tate Butler, a man who accidentally earns a reputation as a gunfighter after one such duel and must from then out face various gunfighters trying to make a name for themselves by challenging him, while trying to escape this wild life for the girl he loves. A Guide to Gunfighters of the Wild West
